summary: Hugo Vartán has run out of ideas for his new book. One day he finds out his roommate's boyfriend witnessed a murder, and he sets out to investigate what happened to use the story for his novel.
cast: Julián Génisson|Ingrid García Jonsson|Vicenç Miralles|Chema Adeva|Lorena Iglesias|Rocío León|Elena Serrano|César Abánades|Miguel Esteban|Daniel Mendez|Xabi Tolosa|Patricia García Méndez|Francisco Serrano|Daniel Luke|Xox Rodríguez|Javier Esquisabel
title: Berserker
